subject_labels: EC2 Auto Scaling groups must use version 1.28 or higher with managed node groups
Implement IRSA (IAM Roles for Service Accounts) for pod-level AWS permissions
Node groups must use Graviton3 (ARM) instances for cost optimization
Enable EC2 add-ons: VPC CNI, CoreDNS, kube-proxy, and AWS EBS CSI Driver
Configure OIDC provider for the cluster to enable IRSA functionality
Implement cluster autoscaling with minimum 2 and maximum 10 nodes per group
Use private subnets only for worker nodes with no direct internet access
Enable EC2 control plane logging for api, audit, authenticator, controllerManager, and scheduler
Tag all resources with Environment, Team, and CostCenter for billing tracking
Configure AWS CLI access through IAM roles, not static credentials
